values: hmm well i just got done watching Exorcism of Emily Rose and woah. That movie is woah scary. haha. its soo weird cause i wake up every night. once at 2 and another at 3. and in the movie 3 is the time of the dead or w.e i dont remember but its something like that. OMFG cheaaaa rthis week and weekend has been woah long. He is the lamb, she is the slaughter. She's moving way too fast and all he wanted was to hold her. Nothing that he tells her is really having an effect. He whispers that he loves her, but she's probably only looking for... cheaaa old favorite song is getting stuck in my headd again!!!

well ... yeah i knew i wasnt going to be able to catch up with this silly livejournal but at least im updating it today. lol. well the past few days havent been too bad. ive been hanging out with my neighbor ron a lot latly. hes really funn. today im going to my friends house since jordan cant hang out well since he has plans later we cant. and thenn after jesss's house were going to a club or a party in new paltz i cant quit remember what she said. but tonight should be woah fun!!!! ooo and today me, ron, mike, michelle, alexis, nick, and joe were hanging out and we were telling eachother what celebrity each of us looks like and thye told me i look like freakin Avril Lavigne and Mary-Kate & Ashley Olson. i definatly dont see it but w.e floats their boats. quick question!! have you ever felt so alone when your surrounded by a whole bunch of people?! its been happening to me latly and i cant quit understand it.

blah today was a pretty goood day. ive been an extreme spaz tho. first this morning i was gettting dressed and i went to put my pants on and a fell and hit my head on my dresser. then i lost my keys. thennn i ripped up an important paper. and now i have a really bad headache so im not gonna go work out and go to belly dancing. quick question ... what is the point of some sports in the winter olympics? like honestly they class some retarded crap as sports and then they go around saying cheerleading isnt a sport. people these days. How can you ache and crave for someone's touch When you have never felt it? I do this for yours, though, And the yearning grows more each day I have never wanted anything in my life As much as I want you When you whisper such sweet love In my ear when we talk You make me melt into a puddle Of complete helplessness You have become my every waking thought And my every dream at night I breathe in so hard Trying to catch my breath when we can't talk I close my eyes so tight Hoping when I open them you will be there But I know I have to wait Until the time is right It seems so far away That I think I am losing my mind I want to breathe in your scent And keep it with me all day long I want to taste your love for me By kissing your sweet lips I want to feel your body next to me So when you leave for awhile I can hold on I just want you to know That I really do love you When the day comes and we are together You will always know and feel this I will always hug, kiss and love you Every moment of the day and night ...You will never have another touch unfelt

Hello im Kiersten well this is about my 5th livejournal. and stupid me kept forgetting the user name and passward. welll anyways this weekend has totally sucked. ive been introuble a lot. and a lot of drama has been going on. and i absolutly hateee drama. this week should be pretty funn. im gonna hang out with a friend. then maybe going painballing this weekend with another friend and make fun of people at the mall. not a definate though. earlier this morning i saw a commercial on tv that was about this breast enlarger thingy. but its just like pulling a stick in and out. hmm maybe i should try it. lmao. welll im not in a good mood so ill probrally update this tomorrow. hopfully i can keeep this live journal going.
